author: djames
msg: Rename python classes to make their names more logical. The RemoteRepository
and LocalRepository classes allow direct access to repositories, but don't
allow access to working copies, so it makes more sense to call them
Rename ClientSession to RemoteRepository. Rename LocalClient to
Adjust to use new names from client.py.

author: pburba
msg: Fix Issue #2782 - Merge to missing file target appears to succeed.
(do_single_file_merge): If target is missing set action to skip.

author: dlr
msg: (do_merge, do_single_file_merge): Avoid unnecessary allocation of a
svn_opt_revision_t structure when a peg revision was not specified

author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r25038, simplify errors returned by get_wc_or_repos_mergeinfo().
